long_description: Offering just the right amount of coverage during warm-weather runs, the REI Tech Sleeveless T-shirt boosts your comfort with specialized fabric. Stretchy, moisture-wicking fabric features high recycled content. Fabric provides UPF 50+ protection from harmful solar rays. Flat, ergonomic seams reduce chafing. Low-profile REI reflective logo; additional reflectivity on center back. The REI Tech Sleeveless T-shirt offers a next-to-body, athletic fit.
short_description: Offering just the right amount of coverage during warm-weather runs, the REI Tech Sleeveless T-shirt boosts your comfort with specialized fabric.
